title: Home row as modifiers + IJKL cursor

manipulators.description: spacebar + a + s + d + f -> left_control + left_option + left_command + to_key
spacebar + a + s + d -> left_control + left_option + to_key
spacebar + a + s + f -> left_control + left_command + to_key
spacebar + a + d + f -> left_option + left_command + to_key
spacebar + s + d + f -> left_option + left_command + to_key

rules.description:
Change A/S/D/F and J/K/L/; to ⇧/⌃/⌥/⌘ and ⌘/⌥/⌃/⇧ when press 2/3/4 keys simultaneously on the same side;
 S+V -> ⌃; D+V -> ⌥; K+M -> ⌥; L+M -> ⌃

manipulators.description: a + s + d + f -> left_control + left_option + left_command + to_key
a + s + d -> left_control + left_option + to_key
a + s + f -> left_control + left_command + to_key
a + d + f -> left_option + left_command + to_key
s + d + f -> left_option + left_command + to_key
semicolon + l + k + j -> left_control + left_option + left_command + to_key
semicolon + l + k -> left_control + left_option + to_key
semicolon + l + j -> left_control + left_command + to_key
semicolon + k + j -> left_option + left_command + to_key
l + k + j -> left_option + left_command + to_key
